GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all the registered users

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing a single article based on provided article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing the comments for a given article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows a user to post a new comment to an article with a given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows a user to update an articles votes by a given article_id
